text.div:
CPG Common Process

Common processes used to describe the high-level, conceptual activities that occur as part of the delivery of guideline-based care

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/cpg/CodeSystem/cpg-common-process

name: CPG_Common_Process
title: CPG Common Process
publisher: Health Level 7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG
description: Common processes used to describe the high-level, conceptual activities that occur as part of the delivery of guideline-based care
